Retrieve directory group information that has been pushed to Code42 from SCIM or User Directory Sync.

The results returned can then be used in the Watchlists API to automatically assign users to watchlists by directory group.

For information about pushing directory group information to Code42, see our [support article](https://support.code42.com/Incydr/Admin/Monitoring_and_managing/Manage_watchlists#Push_groups_to_Code42).
